verses.text: Hurry, God, \w to|strong="H1732"\w* deliver \w me|strong="H2142"\w*. \w Come|strong="H2142"\w* quickly \w to|strong="H1732"\w* help \w me|strong="H2142"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* disappointed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* confounded \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul. Let those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* desire \w my|strong="H3068"\w* ruin \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H3068"\w* back \w in|strong="H3068"\w* disgrace.

\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* them \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* because \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* \w shame|strong="H3637"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* say, “Aha! Aha!”

\w Let|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* who seek \w you|strong="H5921"\w* rejoice \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* glad \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Let|strong="H7725"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* who love \w your|strong="H5921"\w* salvation continually \w say|strong="H7725"\w*, “\w Let|strong="H7725"\w* God \w be|strong="H7725"\w* exalted!”

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3605"\w* am poor \w and|strong="H8055"\w* needy. Come \w to|strong="H1245"\w* \w me|strong="H1245"\w* quickly, God. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1245"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w help|strong="H3444"\w* \w and|strong="H8055"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w deliverer|strong="H3444"\w*. \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, don’t delay.
